definition: lit. pull one hair and the whole body moves/fig. a slight change will affect everything else/the butterfly effect
pinyin: qian1 yi1 fa4 er2 dong4 quan2 shen1

definition: to lead along/to pull (an animal on a tether)/(bound form) to involve/to draw in
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
hair/Taiwan pr. [fa3]
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
all/whole/entire/every/complete
surname Quan
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: Pull one hair and move watch one spot all over and see whole picture.
sentences.chinese: 牵一发而动全身观一斑而见全豹。

definition: to involve/to drag in
tangled and complicated (idiom)
chain reaction
closely linked with one another/interlocked/to interrelate
to share the same interests (idiom)/to be closely related/to be in the same boat
large tail obstructs action (idiom); bottom heavy/fig. rendered ineffective by subordinates
see 一著不慎，滿盤皆輸|一着不慎，满盘皆输[yi1 zhao1 bu4 shen4 , man3 pan2 jie1 shu1]
to concern/on (some topic)/about/concerning/to have importance for
of great concern
to suffer serious injury (idiom)
plethora of things to tackle/multitude of loose ends/very complicated/chaotic

a fire in the city gates is also a calamity for the fish in the moat (idiom); the bystander will also suffer/fig. you can't escape responsibility for your actions/ask not for whom the bell tolls - it tolls for thee
pinyin: cheng2 men2 shi1 huo3 , yang1 ji2 chi2 yu2

definition: (lit.) to hold sb by the elbow/(fig.) to hold back/to impede/to handicap
twisted roots and intertwined joints (idiom); complicated and very tricky/knotty and deeply-rooted difficulties
to take drastic measures to deal with a situation/to pull the carpet from under sb
an ant hole may cause the collapse of a great dike (idiom)/huge damage may result from a moment's negligence
